item.dc:creator: @WrittenBlade WrittenBlade
item.description:
@WrittenBlade wrote:

kihomura:

No, I’m not, I’m tired of faggots like you that are giving these forums a bad reputation. I flame the retards, such as you, you post in the wrong section, you don’t contribute to the community, you just sit here and download all day, and you can’t even use proper grammar/spelling/punctuations etc; So do us all a favor, and fuck off.

You and I took down Phail Sh0w. If he’s gone, we can improve this community.

spiderman theme
